timeline.message: Use a central method to set net.peer.name and net.peer.ip

timeline.body:
i think inlining this var is nice
```suggestion
        setPeer(span, remoteConnection.getHostString(), null);
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
i think inlining this var is nice

Suggested change
String peerName = remoteConnection.getHostString();
setPeer(span, peerName, null);
setPeer(span, remoteConnection.getHostString(), null);
timeline.author: trask

timeline.body: i think remove this method and call `setPeer(span, peerName, null)` directly, and i think restructure setPeer below a bit to not to delegate to this method

timeline.body: Please create `BaseTracer`, define `setPeer` method there and then delegate to `BaseDecorator` as here. Then we will have to change only one place when in the future we replace all decorators with tracers

timeline.bodyHTML:
i think this reads a little clearer:

Suggested change
peerService = (peerService == null) ? mapToPeer(peerIp) : peerService;
if (peerService == null) {
peerService = mapToPeer(peerIp);
}
